sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEGORBE, a town of Spain, in the kingdom of Valencia, with the title of a duchy, and a biſhop’s ſee. It is ſeated on the ſide of a hill, between the mountains, in a ſoil very fertile in corn and wine, and where there are quarries of fine marble. It was taken from the Moors in 1245; and the Romans thought it worth their while to carry ſome of the marble to Rome. W.
